sections.heading: Overview
content:
Alan K. Mauser, DPM, has been practicing podiatric medicine and surgery for
the past 15 years in Louisville, Ky. He is board certified in foot and ankle
surgery by the American Board of Podiatric Surgery and is a fellow of the
American College of Foot and Ankle Surgeons. Mauser graduated from the Dr.
William M. Scholl College of Podiatric Medicine in Chicago and completed his
surgical training in 1985 at the Humana Specialty Hospital in Memphis,
Tenn.

Mauser is a member of the Kentucky Podiatric Medical Association and the American Podiatric Medical
Association . He has been a member of the state exam testing committee and
currently is chairman of the Kentucky Podiatric Medical Association Peer Review
Committee. He also is a clinical instructor with the Kentucky Podiatry
Residency Association.
